channel.title: New Runescape 2006 Remake! Need Staff!
channel.description:
As of right now, 06 Project is progressing to be a RuneScape 2006 Remake. Please note that the server is still in beta stage and will progress as I continue programming it!
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg839/scaled.php?server=839&filename=40378401.png&res=landing[/img]
[size=18pt]Need Staff:[/size] - 1-2 Coders, at long as you can code a simple thing, your in :p - 1 Forums designer/supervisor (includes web client) [size=18pt]Features:[/size] - Woodcutting 95% working - Mining 95% working - Combat 95% working - Smithing 99% working - Fishing 50% working - Herblore 70% working - Magic 95% working - Full firemaking, with clipped directions - Fully working Barrows! - Working KBD [size=18pt]Need to fix:[/size] - Tanning on fires only - Mining 1 pure/rune ess per rock - Selling items to general store that isnt already in there - Most Dungeons and ladders
[size=18pt]How to play:[/size] Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?cinsv0odbvv7dad Copy cache to C:\ Drive Hit run, and gl :D

item.title: New Runescape 2006 Remake! Need Staff!
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:3, topic:458963”]Couple things,

  1. Can you post more features please?
  2. Do you have a website?
  3. Can you post more media please?
  4. Why doesn’t the cache auto download why do we have to manually put it in the c:\ drive lol?
  5. I guarantee you there is more bugs then the ones you stated also.[/quote]

answer = hes an idiot, i logged in he said add my skype and shut off server. /end

Read full topic

item.title: New Runescape 2006 Remake! Need Staff!
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Some things in your bugs are really easy to fix, and The Essence thing is not a bug, When you mine one off the ore, its unlimited resources, Secondly possibly add the Quest to be able to get to them?

Read full topic

item.title: New Runescape 2006 Remake! Need Staff!
item.dc:creator: @iduonex iduonex
item.description:
@iduonex wrote:

As of right now, 06 Project is progressing to be a RuneScape 2006 Remake.
Please note that the server is still in beta stage and will progress as I continue programming it!

[size=18pt]Need Staff:[/size]

  • 1-2 Coders, at long as you can code a simple thing, your in
  • 1 Forums designer/supervisor (includes web client)
    [size=18pt]Features:[/size]
  • Woodcutting 95% working
  • Mining 95% working
  • Combat 95% working
  • Smithing 99% working
  • Fishing 50% working
  • Herblore 70% working
  • Magic 95% working
  • Full firemaking, with clipped directions
  • Fully working Barrows!
  • Working KBD
    [size=18pt]Need to fix:[/size]
  • Tanning on fires only
  • Mining 1 pure/rune ess per rock
  • Selling items to general store that isnt already in there
  • Most Dungeons and ladders

[size=18pt]How to play:[/size]
Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?cinsv0odbvv7dad
Copy cache to C:\ Drive
Hit run, and gl

Read full topic
